body_html:
Two issues:
1)Permission denied and 2)NCCL not found

Directly run the below command and print the error log (if any):

python setup.py build install

The setup.py script will automatically detect NCCL etc. and also compile Caffe2. Any changes you want to make as per your system / libraries, you can change in setup.cfg (if needed)

If you have still have the permission denied error,
try chmod +x setup.py and repeat

Two issues: 
1)Permission denied and 2)NCCL not found

Directly run the below command and print the error log (if any):

`python setup.py build install`

The setup.py script will automatically detect NCCL etc. and also compile Caffe2. Any changes you want to make as per your system / libraries, you can change in setup.cfg (if needed)

If you have still have the permission denied error,
 try `chmod +x setup.py` and repeat
